problemSetting¶

Direction of Progress: questionNumInput.py –> problemSetting.py, descriptiveGradingUI.py –> totalResult.py

  • Receive and store metadata such as scores, marking locations, and problem types of each question in the test

  • Using the data collected so far, proceed with grading

  • Subsequent results are sorted and then moved to the totalResult section

class problemSetting.problemSetting.UI_ProblemSetting¶

UI classes to specify and grade metadata for each problem

Method that progresses grading

Parameters

totalProblemList –

Returns

nothing

mouseCallbackROI(event, x, y)¶

method for mouse drag recognition

Parameters

  • event – mouse click event

  • x – x coordinate

  • y – y coordinate

Returns

nothing

mouseCallbackSpot(event, x, y)¶

Method for recognizing mouse click points

Parameters

  • event – mouse click event

  • x – x coordinate

  • y – y coordinate

Returns

nothing

onAreaButtonClicked()¶

Action when problem area button is pressed.

Specify the marking areas for one question in an empty test paper and whether each area should be marked or not

Returns

nothing

onFinishButtonClicked()¶

Issue Behavior when the Metadata Complete button is pressed.

End problem collection and turn over all problem metadata collected.

Saving information from the last problem.

Returns

nothing

onNextButtonClicked()¶

The action when the Skip to next question button is pressed.

Organize the problem information so far and hand it over to the next UI.

Returns

nothing
